forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: extra invisable parts when building?

comments.text: me and choates were in his area and he was experiencing issues in an area with invisable parts taking up space, so we started looking around and found that some objects were
glitched and had odd invisable objects connected to them or had merged with something odd far away from that area so now we are on a scavenger hunt to fix them all
possibly connected are unselectable terrain parts in the future. i cant select or color nor delete white part of terrain by my gantry. positive it is part of one object
